Summary: Low noise, Lots of Lights. Planes.
trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around October 3rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at my desk, when I heard a low noise. I look up puzzled and I saw what seemed to be a UFO. The sighting was near London City Airport so it may have been a plane, but I doubt it. At first I thought it was a plane but then, I've never heard a plane make that noise. It was a humming noise, not like plane engines. When I looked up I was puzzled. It looked very close, lower than most planes. It was a disc dotted with lights. Coloured round the edges with two blue lights at the rear. It flew steadily, going over my house, which is when I lost track of it. That wasn't the end. For the next 20 minutes we saw a massive increase in plane activity, at two points seeing a plane with an exceptionally bright light at the front (goverment search ships, or alien scouts?). This sighting was somewhat unlikely. I do live near an airport, but if there are additional sightings, we may have "visitors".
